item.title: Tesla Slashes Price For Model 3 Long Range RWD In China Amid Poor Global Sales
item.description: Elon Musk-Led Tesla announced a 3.7% price cut for its Model 3 Long Range Trim in China amid declining global sales. read more

item.title: Trump Says Prices Are 'Way Down' With 'Virtually No Inflation', Targets Windmills Again

item.title: Elizabeth Warren Slams Trump's $67 Billion Corporate Giveaway, Says Big Business Gets Five Times More Than Child Care

item.title: Midair Collision Between 2 Planes At Colorado Airport Results In 1 Death
item.description: Midair collision between two small aircraft at Colorado airport results in 1 death and 3 injuries. FAA and NTSB will investigate. read more
